external_games.name: Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg Route Add-On

name: Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg Route
summary: Take a trip to the late 2000s and experience frequent passenger and heavy freight services, be in control of classic and modern traction as you traverse through the heart of Northern Germany. Electric Containers and Karlsruher Kopf n-Wagens await in Train Sim World 3: Bahnstrecke Bremen - Oldenburg.
